Title: Enacts the "build to need act"
Summary: Enacts the "build to need act" to meet the state's electrification and climate related policy mandates; directs the public service commission to implement a grid planning process; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง77-a, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to enacting the "build to need act"
